/* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.serialmgmt.impl.SerialScanningGISMOMapper.selectSerialScanningGISMOList] 20191121 - KR OHK */ SELECT /* SMO */ AA.*, s1.SALES_ORD_NO ordno, H11.BNDL_NO, S26.STK_DESC AS itm_name, TO_char(s46.APPNT_DT , 'yyyymmdd') AS APPNT_DT, ROWNUM rnum FROM ( SELECT /*l55.DELVRY_NO AS delno,*/ l47.REQST_NO AS reqstno, l47.REQST_CRT_DT, TO_CHAR(l47.REQST_CRT_DT, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS reqstdt, L47.REQST_TYPE as reqstType, l47.trnsc_type AS trnscType, -- US : STO, UM and L47.REQST_TYPE = 'PO' : Inbound SMO, UM and L47.REQST_TYPE <> 'PO' : SMO l47.TRNSC_TYPE_DTL as trnsctypedtl, --DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR (s28c.WH_LOC_DESC, 4000) AS frmloc, '('||s28q.WH_LOC_CODE || ')' || DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR (s28q.WH_LOC_DESC, 4000) AS toloc, l47.RCIV_CDC_RDC AS frmlocid, l47.REQST_CDC_RDC AS tolocid, NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MAX(l55.DELVRY_DT), 'yyyymmdd'), 'dd/mm/yyyy'), '-') AS deldate, SUM(NVL(l48.reqst_qty,0)) AS reqstQty, SUM(NVL(l55.DELVRY_QTY,0)) AS delqty, (SUM(NVL(l48.reqst_qty,0)) - SUM(NVL(l55.DELVRY_QTY,0))) AS remainQty, l47.REF_DOC_NO, MIN(l48.itm_code) AS itm_code FROM log0047m l47, log0048d l48, ( SELECT B.REQST_NO, B.REQST_NO_ITM, SUM(B.DELVRY_QTY) AS DELVRY_QTY, MAX(C.DELVRY_DT) AS DELVRY_DT FROM log0047m M, log0048D A, LOG0055D B, LOG0054M C, sys0028m D WHERE 1=1 AND M.reqst_no = A.reqst_no AND A.REQST_NO = B.REQST_NO AND A.REQST_NO_ITM = B.REQST_NO_ITM AND B.DELVRY_NO = C.DELVRY_NO AND M.reqst_cdc_rdc = D.WH_LOC_ID(+) AND NVL(B.del_flag,'N') <> 'Y' AND M.trnsc_type IN ('UM') AND M.REQST_TYPE <> 'PO' AND M.REQST_CRT_DT >= to_date(#{searchDeliverySDate},'dd/mm/yyyy') -- FROM AND M.REQST_CRT_DT <= to_date(#{searchDeliveryEDate} || ' 23:59:59','dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') -- TO
AND (1, M.RCIV_CDC_RDC) IN
(1, #{item})
AND (1, M.REQST_CDC_RDC) IN
(1, #{item})
AND (M.REQST_NO = #{searchRequestNo} or UPPER(D.WH_LOC_DESC) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{searchRequestNo}) || '%')
GROUP BY B.REQST_NO, B.REQST_NO_ITM ) l55, sys0028m s28q, SYS0026M s26 WHERE 1 = 1 AND l47.REQST_NO = l48.REQST_NO AND l48.REQST_NO = l55.REQST_NO(+) AND l48.REQST_NO_ITM = l55.REQST_NO_ITM(+) AND l47.REQST_CDC_RDC= s28q.WH_LOC_ID(+)
AND l48.itm_code= s26.STK_CODE(+)
AND l47.REQST_CRT_DT >= to_date(#{searchDeliverySDate},'dd/mm/yyyy') -- FROM AND l47.REQST_CRT_DT <= to_date(#{searchDeliveryEDate} || ' 23:59:59','dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') -- TO
AND (1, l47.RCIV_CDC_RDC) IN
(1, #{item})
AND (1, l47.REQST_CDC_RDC) IN
(1, #{item})
AND (l47.REQST_NO = #{searchRequestNo} or UPPER(s28q.WH_LOC_DESC) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{searchRequestNo}) || '%')
AND (l48.itm_code = #{searchItm} or UPPER(l48.ITM_NAME) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{searchItm}) || '%')
AND s26.STK_CTGRY_ID IN
#{item}
AND s26.STK_TYPE_ID IN
#{item}
AND l47.trnsc_type IN ('UM') AND L47.REQST_TYPE <> 'PO' AND NVL(l47.REQST_STUS, 'N') <> 'C' AND NVL(l47.REQST_DEL , 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(l48.REQST_DEL , 'N') = 'N' AND s28q.SERIAL_REQUIRE_CHK_YN = 'Y'
GROUP BY /*l55.DELVRY_NO,*/ l47.REQST_NO, l47.REQST_CRT_DT, L47.REQST_TYPE, l47.trnsc_type, l47.TRNSC_TYPE_DTL, s28q.WH_LOC_CODE, s28q.WH_LOC_DESC, l47.RCIV_CDC_RDC, l47.REQST_CDC_RDC, l47.REF_DOC_NO HAVING SUM(NVL(l48.reqst_qty,0)) > SUM(NVL(l55.DELVRY_QTY,0)) ) AA, sal0046D s46, sal0001D s1, HMC0011D H11, SYS0026M S26 WHERE 1=1 AND AA.REF_DOC_NO = s46.INSTALL_ENTRY_NO (+) AND s46.SALES_ORD_ID = s1.SALES_ORD_ID (+) AND S1.BNDL_ID = H11.ORD_SEQ_NO(+) AND AA.itm_code = S26.STK_CODE
AND (UPPER(AA.REF_DOC_NO) = UPPER(#{searchRequestNo2}) or UPPER(H11.BNDL_NO) = UPPER(#{searchRequestNo2}) or s1.SALES_ORD_NO = #{searchRequestNo2})
AND s46.APPNT_DT >= to_date(#{searchSAppntDt},'dd/mm/yyyy') -- FROM AND s46.APPNT_DT <= to_date(#{searchEAppntDt} || ' 23:59:59','dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') -- TO
ORDER BY REQST_CRT_DT, reqstno
